column4: after installing fglrx drivers; i freeze after boot splash at a black screen; Ubuntu 9.10 fresh install; ATI 4850
after installing fglrx drivers; i freeze after boot splash at a black screen; Ubuntu 9.10 fresh install; ATI 4850
reboot in recovery mode; reconfigure X (make sure you have the right driver package for your card installed and do dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg)
